item.title: Behind the Scenes: Creating Ascendance
item.description: Three weeks after the launch of Ascendance, it’s time to lift the veil on the behind-the-scenes of this creation. How do you transform an artistic idea into an interactive work? A look back at a creative process that blends electroacoustic composition and software development. The Creative Spark: When Genealogy Meets Acousmatic Music The idea for Ascendance was born from a simple observation: our family trees resemble musical scores. Each branch evokes a melodic line, each generation suggests a tessitura, each ancestor carries within them a unique sonic story.
